item.title: [HIVE-28439] Iceberg: Bucket partition transform with DECIMAL can throw NPE
item.description:
Hive can fail when we bucket records by decimal columns.

CREATE TABLE test (c_decimal DECIMAL(38, 0)) PARTITIONED BY SPEC (bucket(8, c_decimal)) STORED BY ICEBERG;
INSERT INTO test VALUES (CAST('50000000000000000000441610525' AS DECIMAL(38, 0)));
